Title: Standard Chartered meets CBN’s ₦200bn recapitalisation
Summary: Standard Chartered Bank Nigeria Limited has announced that it has met the Central Bank of Nigeria’s (CBN) ₦200 billion minimum capital requirement for national commercial banks well ahead of the March 2026 deadline, reaffirming its long-term commitment to the Nigerian economy .

Title: Atletico’s Le Normand set to miss Spain qualifiers after knee injury
Summary: Robin Le Normand has suffered a ‘high grade’ knee injury, Atletico Madrid say . The Spanish centre-back went off hurt during his team’s 3-1 Champions League win over Union Saint-Gilloise on Tuesday . Atletico did not reveal whether he will miss Spain's next two Euro 2016 qualifiers

Title: Army short service recruitment closes in one week
Summary: The Nigerian Army has announced that applications for the Short Service Combatant Course 49/2026 will close in one week . The application portal, which opened on 9 October, has received tens of thousands of applications .

Title: Navy rescues 11 stranded passengers from sinking boat along Bonny River
Summary: Nigerian Navy rescues 11 stranded passengers from sinking boat along Bonny River . Rescue operation took place on Tuesday, November 4, 2025, at about 1:00 p.m. The rescue operation was carried out by the Nigerian Navy Forward Operating Base, Bonny .

Title: FG moves to improve ferry services in Niger Delta
Summary: The Federal Government has inaugurated a Project Development Committee (PDC) for the proposed Niger Delta Ferry Service . The PPPP initiative is aimed at boosting transportation, trade, and economic activities across riverine communities in the Niger Delta region .

Title: PDP Convention: APC using courts to destabilise parties — Bode George
Summary: Chief Olabode George accused the ruling All Progressives Congress of weaponising the judiciary to destabilise political parties and undermine Nigeria’s democracy . Former Deputy National Chairman of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) said the ruling party is weaponising courts to undermine political parties .

Title: Police in Delta kill suspected kidnapper, rescue female victim
Summary: Police shot dead one suspected kidnapper in a gun battle at a forest in Obinomba community, Ukwuani Local Government Area . The State Commissioner of Police, Mr. Olufemi Abaniwonda, disclosed this .

Title: Tinubu, Sultan, Uzodimma, other eminent personalities headline editors’ conference
Summary: Tinubu, Sultan, Uzodimma, other eminent personalities headline editors’ conference . Editors of print, online, broadcast organisations and news agencies arrive from across the country for their annual conference . The Nigerian Guild of Editors (NGE) will hold on November 12 and 13, 2025 .

Title: Aiyedatiwa hails Tinubu’s education reforms
Summary: Ondo State Governor, Lucky Aiyedatiwa, hails President Bola Tinubu's education reforms . He described them as transformative and impactful .

Title: Senate moves to impose stiffer penalties for chemical ripening of fruits
Summary: Senate moves to impose stiffer penalties for chemical ripening of fruits . The Senate has announced plans to amend existing laws to introduce tougher punishments for individuals found guilty of artificially ripening fruits with harmful chemicals .

Title: Police probe fresh killings in Benue communities
FG secures discounted diagnostics deal, investment pledge in China
Anambra poll: Obi calls for peaceful election
Senate okays 14-year jail term for sexual harassment in schools
Air chief orders commanders to intensify strikes on terrorists, insurgents
